#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<bitset>
using namespace std;
#define LL long long int
#define MOD 8388608
int main()
{
	LL t,n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		if(n>23)
		{
			printf("8388607\n");
			
		}
		else{
		LL sum=0;
		for(LL i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			LL k=1<<(i-1);
			
			sum+=((k*i*(i+1))/2);
			sum%=MOD	;
		}
		cout<<sum%MOD<<endl;
		}
	}
	
return 0;	
}
